6  uint64_t Motor::timeMillis()
7  {
8  using namespace std::chrono;
9  return duration_cast<milliseconds>(system_clock::now().time_since_epoch()).count();
10  }

13  Motor::Motor(std::string _name, ros::NodeHandle* _nh, std::string _topic)
14  : AlleyHoopMVC::Actuator(_name), nh(*_nh), topic_name(_topic), percentage(50), pub_rate(250), pub_time(timeMillis() + pub_rate)
15  {
16  pub = nh.advertise<std_msgs::UInt8>(topic_name, 1);
17  }

28 
29  void Motor::update()
30  {
31  if(timeMillis() > pub_time)
32  {
33  std_msgs::UInt8 msg;
34  msg.data = percentage;
35  pub.publish(msg);
36  pub_time = timeMillis() + pub_rate;
37  }
38  }
39 }
